hero.name: Muhammad Zawar Hussain
hero.heading: Hey! I’m Zawar
hero.description: I'm a skilled Full Stack Developer and Mobile App Developer with a passion for crafting innovative and user-friendly digital solutions. With expertise in React, React Native, Node.js, and Firebase, I bring ideas to life with seamless functionality and polished designs. Let's build something amazing together!

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR Web & Mobile Application Projects PROJECTS
about.description: I am a dedicated Full Stack Developer and Mobile App Developer with a strong background in building responsive web and mobile applications. With over a year of professional experience, I specialize in technologies like React, React Native, Node.js, and Firebase. My focus is on creating intuitive, scalable, and efficient solutions that meet user needs and business goals. When I’m not coding, I enjoy exploring new tech trends and sharpening my skills to stay ahead in the industry.

details.title: Bull's Eye IView App
details.description: A Mobile Application in React Native designed for endoscopy purposes. The app is integrated with a camera, such as the AMB82, allowing medical professionals to capture high-quality images and videos of patients during treatment. Additionally, the app provides features for entering patient data and bios, streamlining the documentation process in medical settings. It also ensures secure data storage and easy retrieval, improving efficiency and accuracy in patient care workflows.

details.title: Billboard App
details.description: A Mobile Application for ordering customized billboards, enabling users to browse available billboard locations, select preferences, and place orders effortlessly. The app features an intuitive interface that allows users to customize billboard designs, choose display durations, and manage bookings. It also integrates secure payment options and real-time tracking for active advertisements. By streamlining the billboard advertising process, the app caters to businesses of all sizes, enhancing accessibility and efficiency.

details.title: Car Design & Modification System
details.description: A Car Design & Modification System using the MERN stack, allowing users to customize cars with different colors, rims, and lights. The system features a 360-degree car view for a detailed visualization of the modifications. Users can finalize their designs and book the car according to their preferences, making the process seamless and interactive.

details.title: RaceBase Logbook App
details.description: A Mobile App which is regarded as one of the best drag racing logbook software in the world. RaceBase allows drag racing enthusiasts to track and analyze their racing performances with features like detailed logs, real-time updates, and race data storage. The app’s user-friendly interface and comprehensive tools help racers stay organized and improve their performance over time.

details.title: HolidayFares App
details.description: A Mobile Application designed to provide a seamless hotel booking experience. The app enables users to browse an extensive list of hotels, view detailed descriptions, compare prices, and make reservations effortlessly. It includes features such as filtering options for location, price, and amenities, ensuring users find the perfect stay. With secure payment integration and real-time booking confirmation, the app offers a reliable and hassle-free solution for travelers. Its user-friendly design ensures smooth navigation and a convenient experience for all users.

allService.title: Website Development
allService.subTitle: Creating modern and Responsive Websites for your Business.

allService.title: Mobile App Development
allService.subTitle: Building User-Friendly and Feature-Rich Mobile Applications.

allService.title: Ecommerce Services
allService.subTitle: Delivering end-to-end solutions for seamless online shopping experiences.

allService.title: Backend API Integration
allService.subTitle: Ensuring robust and efficient backend API integrations for your applications.

allExperience.companyDescription: As a React Native Developer, I played a pivotal role in developing real-time, cross-platform mobile applications, prioritizing optimal performance and scalability. Collaborating closely with the design team, I created intuitive and responsive user interfaces using React Navigation and NativeBase, significantly enhancing user experience. Additionally, I integrated RESTful APIs, Firebase, and third-party services to ensure seamless data synchronization and effective backend communication, boosting overall app functionality and reliability.

In my role as a Full Stack Developer, I delivered tailored full-stack solutions for real-time React websites and React Native applications, aligning with client needs and driving operational efficiency. I implemented modern, responsive UI designs using Tailwind CSS, which resulted in increased user interaction and satisfaction. Additionally, I focused on optimizing application performance by applying thorough code optimization and refactoring practices, leading to faster load times and a smoother overall user experience.

allExperience.company: SUI NORTHERN GAS PIPELINE LIMITED | ONSITE
allExperience.companyDescription: As a Backend Developer, I developed and maintained Node.js servers for both web and mobile applications using TypeScript and JavaScript, which helped streamline customer service operations. I also refactored legacy Java-based systems to Node.js, significantly improving system performance and reducing server load. In addition, I built and integrated RESTful APIs to ensure seamless data exchange across the organization’s web and mobile platforms, enhancing overall system reliability and efficiency.
